description: Colors all the icons in the garage, shops, achievements, etc. with your player colors.
name: Colored Icon Kit

center-icons.name: Center Icons
center-icons.description: Makes the icons on the last pages centered.

color-locked-icons.name: Color Locked Icons
color-locked-icons.description: Applies coloring to icons you have not unlocked yet.

hide-locks.name: Hide Locks
hide-locks.description: Hides locks in the icon kit.

locked-icon-detail.name: Locked Icon Detail
locked-icon-detail.description: Shows otherwise hidden details on locked icons.

lock-opacity.name: Lock Opacity
lock-opacity.description: Sets the opacity of locks in the icon kit.

locked-icon-opacity.name: Locked Icon Opacity
locked-icon-opacity.description: Sets the opacity of locked icons in the icon kit.
